lines.text: Earth is made up of 3 layers
Helps to drive formation of crust

secText:
Lesson:
1. Show the layers of the Earth and discuss the [OBJ:expsec_c354221:relative heat in each layer].
2. Discuss convection and conduction in [OBJ:expsec_ c3542234:heat transfer in the Earth].
3. Discuss the “short” and [OBJ:expsec_c35812142:long time scales of our planet].
